Description: The next generation of Yu-Gi-Oh battle it out at the Duel Academy. The semifinal round is here. Will the mysterious (and evil) David Rabb ruin everything?
Title: YU-GI-OH! GX, VOL. 7
Author: Naoyuki Kageyama

Description: Rin Okumura joins an exorcist academy in order to control his inner demon. Will his classmates find out about his satanic bloodline?
Title: BLUE EXORCIST, VOL. 3
Author: Kazue Kato

Description: This series is about grade-school boys who want to become professionals in the manga industry. Do they have what it takes?
Title: BAKUMAN, VOL. 6
Author: Tsugumi Ohba

Description: Two brothers harmed in a ritual that was half magic/half science seek the legendary Philosopher’s Stone to make things right. This edition collects volumes four, five and six of the regular series.
Title: FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST (3-IN-1 EDITION), VOL. 2
Author: Hiromu Arakawa

Description: Sebastian is a loyal butler who moves easily from dinner parties to the underworld. Is he too good to be true? Is he even human? In this volume: a mystery at the circus.
Title: BLACK BUTLER, VOL. 6
Author: Yana Toboso

Description: This is a story about destiny and Sakura, the princess of a moon kingdom who is fated to wield a legendary sword.
Title: SAKURA HIME: THE LEGEND OF PRINCESS SAKURA, VOL. 3
Author: Arina Tanemura

Description: Another Romeo and Juliet tale: Mizuki is the the lead guitarist in an all-girl rock band. Akira is from an all-boy school and wants to join. Can they become band mates and something more?
Title: AI ORE-LOVE ME, VOL. 2
Author: Mayu Shinjo

Description: Asuka Masamune, one of his school’s jocks, is hiding a secret. He really likes cooking, manga for girls and sewing. Will falling for Ryo Miyakozuka, the daughter of a martial artist, help him?
Title: OTOMEN, VOL. 11
Author: Aya Kanno

Description: Political intrigue abounds! What happened between Danzo, the leader of Konoha, and his brother, Itachi? And where does Naruto fit in?
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 51
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Description: More Pokemon madness. Collect them all!
Title: POKéMON ADVENTURES, VOL. 14
Author: Hidenori Kusaka and Satoshi Yamamoto
Contributor: by Hidenori Kusaka and Satoshi Yamamoto
